allOf.description: Start allocating ports at this value, going upward

backend-url.description: The backend url that varnish will cache

web-checker.description: Controls automated cache checker, disabled if null or empty

frontend-url.description: Override entry-point-url web checker will check the HTTP headers of all links in the web site, '%(ip)s' and '%(port)s' being substituted with varnish's listening ip and port, respectively

mail-address.description: Email address to which web checker result is sent

smtp-host.description: The smtp server to be used to send the web checker result
